required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study of Azilsartan Tablets in Chinese Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Single-Dose, Randomized, Open-Label, Two-Way Crossover Study to Evaluate the Bioequivalence of Azilsartan Tablets in Chinese Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to determine the bioequivalence of two azilsartan formulations after administration of single doses to healthy subjects under fasted and fed conditions. These data were to be evaluated statistically to determine if the products meet bioequivalence criteria.

arm_group.description: Subjects will take a single Azilsartan (Zhaoke) 20mg Tablet under fasting condition
Subjects will take a single Azilva 20mg Tablet under fasting condition
Subjects will take a single Azilsartan (Zhaoke) 20mg Tablet under fed condition
Subjects will take a single Azilva 20mg Tablet under fed condition

facility.name: Phase I Clinical Trial Centre, Chinese University of Hong Kong
